column5: Looking for a Washinton Capitals number 25 sweater.Where is the best place to find one?Been checking e-bay and google with no luck.A toronto sweater will not work. Joe
Have you been here yet?  http://www.dropthepucks.com/sotg/Caps.htm
Great now I know what i am getting for Christmas......    Art
Thanx for the link Brian,Guess I'll have to keep checking back.Art,if you dont like it I will wear it for ya. Joe
